plot: After a nuclear holocaust, a group of surivors send a pair of adventurers in their group in search of a mythic city called Ciudad Horizonte.
title: Mañana el silencio
plot_es: After a nuclear holocaust, a group of surivors send a pair of adventurers in their group in search of a mythic city called Ciudad Horizonte.
plot_en: After a nuclear holocaust, a group of surivors send a pair of adventurers in their group in search of a mythic city called Ciudad Horizonte.
